title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - A Big Time in British Boxing
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - A Big Time in British Boxing
description:
Joining Mannix this week is Sergio Mora, former junior middleweight champion and DAZN broadcaster. Mannix and Mora dive into Joe Joyce's huge win over Joseph Parker, the latest with Tyson Fury and Anthony Joshua, next steps for Demetrius Andrade, a Floyd Mayweather-Jake Paul showdown and more; later, junior middleweight contender Sebastian Fundora on making weight, his recent surge, the backstory on his fighting family and more. #Volume #Herd #ColinCowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
